Module pipeline

Package tcpassos.pipeline

package tcpassos.pipeline
  • Class
    Description
    AtomicPipeline<BEGIN,END>
    A pipeline that can be atomically replaced.
    AtomicUnaryPipeline<T>
    A pipeline that can be atomically replaced.
    BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
    Base of a pipeline, which supports the processing of an input element, returning an output element.
    BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,END>
    Represents a branched pipeline that takes an input of type BEGIN and produces a list of outputs of type END.
    BranchedPipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
    The builder interface for creating a branched pipeline.
    OptionalPipeline<BEGIN,END>
    Processing pipeline using generics that returns an Optional with the output element or a Optional.empty() if the pipeline is interrupted before reaching the end.
    Pipeline<BEGIN,END>
    Processing pipeline using generics.
    Pipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
    Builder with methods to add stages to the pipeline
    Pipes
    A collection of single-step pipelines.
    UnaryPipeline<T>
    A pipeline that receives an input element and returns an output element of the same type.
    UnaryPipeline.Builder<T>
    Builder with methods to add stages to the pipeline
    UnaryPipes
    A collection of single-step pipelines.
